00043     static const size_t MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS = 3;
00044 
00045     static const double pi = 3.1415926535897;
00046 
00047     // Can now handle a single sample.
00048     static const size_t MIN_SAMPLES_TO_CLUSTER = 1;
00049

00051           B_ALLELE_INDEX = 1
00052     };

00054     typedef affx::Gender Gender;
00055

00057     static const Gender GENDER_MALE = affx::Male;
00058     static const Gender GENDER_UNKNOWN = affx::UnknownGender;
00059 
00060     // Caution -- only works for arrays, not for pointers!!
00061 #define ARRAY_SIZE(ary) (sizeof(ary)/sizeof(ary[0]))
00062 
00063     typedef FixedMatrix<double, NUM_ALLELES, NUM_ALLELES> Matrix2x2;
